 2018-11562018-09-07,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of RAYMOND E. IVANY, O.N.S., of Wolfville, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2021, in the place of Colin Dodds, whose term has expired.
